data.cigar_description: small-batch, boutique blend last call maduro from popular cigar-maker aj fenandez presents a unique pennsylvania broadleaf wrapper over a hearty combination of all-nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos. a medium to full-bodied profile of molasses and black pepper delivers hints of citrus and cedar with an earthy aroma. classic, handcrafted shapes showcase a somewhat coarse, veiny wrapper leaf in a blend that offers a distinct richness and depth. impress your favorite boutique fanatics with an original cigar from aj fernandez today.

hot cigar-maker aj fernandez continues to expand his portfolio with a number of boutique releases like last call. originally blended as a small-batch cigar handed out to cigar lovers lucky enough to visit the brand’s casa blanca compound, last call delivers a medium to full-bodied profile. notes of milk chocolate, vanilla, almonds and red peppers reveal a chalky texture with an even burn. add a tasty boutique cigar to your collection with a unique blend handcrafted in nicaragua from a reddish-hued ecuador habano wrapper leaf over nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos in a handful of classic shapes.

aj fernandez enclave broadleaf reflects a joint blending effort between aj fernandez and his father, ismael fernandez. in august of 2019, enclave broadleaf scored 93 points in cigar aficionado for its sweet and earthy profile of cocoa powder, vanilla beans, and leather with a robust finish. the full-bodied, full-flavored cigar is drafted from a succulent connecticut broadleaf wrapper and an ample combination of nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos. choose from a series of popular, well-made shapes designed to showcase aj’s command of nicaraguan taste.

boutique cigar-maker aj fernandez scored 92 points and a top 25 ranking in cigar aficionado back in 2016 for aj fernandez enclave, a medium to full-bodied blend handmade in nicaragua in a balanced collection of 52-ring-gauge shapes. sweet and peppery notes of cinnamon, baking spices, and coffee beans emerge in a recipe of cameroon and nicaraguan long-fillers tucked beneath an oily habano rosado wrapper leaf. a chewy, rich finish resonates with a touch of wood and leather in a bestselling release from aj fernandez.

popular small-batch cigar-maker aj fernandez honors the pre-embargo ‘glory days’ of cuban cigar making with aj fernandez dias de gloria. the blend is conceived from an all-nicaraguan recipe of premium binder and filler tobaccos and a glistening reddish-brown nicaraguan wrapper leaf. tasting notes of leather, black pepper, and wood culminate in a medium-bodied profile handcrafted in estelí, nicaragua. a nutty, spicy, and rich finish emerges in a cool-burning collection of popular bigger ring gauge formats, including a box-pressed toro, while the gordo and robusto are handmade in a round format.

small-batch cigar-making virtuoso aj fernandez creates a masterful medium to full-bodied recipe with aj fernandez bellas artes maduro. a dark and desirous brazilian maduro wrapper leaf encases a well-made core of long-filler tobaccos from san andrés and nicaragua. handcrafted in estelí, nicaragua, bellas artes maduro is available in a range of bigger ring gauge shapes. notes of roasted espresso beans, dark cocoa, wood, and sweet spices emerge throughout an ample profile with a well-balanced finish.

indulge in a medium to full-bodied gem straight from the hands of boutique cigar-making sensation aj fernandez. a chewy nicaraguan wrapper leaf embraces a complex amalgam of long-fillers from nicaragua, brazil, and honduras. notes of cedar, cinnamon, and black pepper culminate with woody spices in a handful of slightly larger ring gauge shapes. aj fernandez bellas artes is patiently handmade in estelí, nicaragua to aj’s impeccable standards for taste, aroma, and consistency.

aging room quattro nicaragua scored 96 points and the ‘#1 cigar of the year’ ranking from cigar aficionado for 2019. one of several unique aging room blends, quattro nicaragua is drawn entirely from premium nicaraguan tobaccos, including the binder, filler, and a dark and oily wrapper leaf. tasting notes of espresso, chocolate, smoked pecan, and pepper develop with a hint of anise. the full-bodied finish is woody and complex. aging room quattro nicaragua cigars have scored high ratings in several sizes, but the 6-by-52 belicoso called the maestro is the highest. quattro nicaragua is blended and handcrafted by aj fernandez in estelí, nicaragua.

acid by drew estate is one of the original and pioneering infused cigar brands to debut in the wake of the cigar boom of the 1990s. the one and only acid kuba kuba remains one of drew estate’s flagship cigars and the bestselling shape in the brand’s popular flavored acid blend. a slightly thick 5 x 54 robusto delivers an original and exotic profile of sweet, herbal, and unmistakable tasting notes with a creamy and captivating bouquet. acid is created in special ‘aroma rooms’ by exposing the tobaccos to a coveted recipe of over 150 oils and botanicals at the drew estate factory in estelí, nicaragua. kuba kuba is the size that put acid on the map back in the day and one of the first cigars many acid fans try. check out our acid customer reviews. acid kuba kuba is handmade with a sumatra wrapper leaf and an infused profile of nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos. add acid to your collection at the lowest prices today!

acid is one of the most unique cigars on the market. manufactured in nicaragua by drew estate, the acid brand features a vast assortment of luscious aromatic blends. rather than using traditional curing barns, drew estate cures tobaccos in what they refer to as “aroma rooms.” these rooms contain over 150 different herbs, oils, spices and botanicals which infuse the tobacco leaves with aroma over time. each acid cigar offers a unique blend and flavor profile.

it’s hard to believe acid by drew estate has been around for 20 years, but the blend actually debuted back in 1999. to commemorate the occasion, the fellas at drew estate created a special anniversary cigar in a 5 x 52 robusto format called acid 20, which handmade at the company’s factory in estelí, nicaragua. a dark and oily san andrés wrapper leaf embraces an amalgam of nicaraguan and indonesian tobaccos that have been infused with brand’s secret recipe of essential oils, herbs, and botanicals to achieve an exotic, rich, and aromatic flavor profile. diehard acid fans can indulge their craving for the brand’s unique taste by buying a box of acid 20 cigars today.

5 vegas is a well-made, well-priced cigar hailing from nicaragua. these cigars feature silky sumatra wrappers and a rich assortment of dominican and nicaraguan long-fillers. the strength is medium-bodied, while the flavor-profile is earthy and nutty with a smooth, clean finish. when you consider the value versus price equation, 5 vegas is a guaranteed winner.

arturo fuente don carlos is a 94-rated masterpiece, handcrafted in the dominican republic from a select recipe of the finest aged tobaccos. fuente family patriarch carlos fuente sr. blended don carlos to an intricate standard of premium, vintage dominican binder and filler tobaccos beneath a glistening cameroon wrapper leaf. the complex, medium-bodied profile delivers lavish notes of earth and cedar with nuances of oak, espresso beans, and chestnuts. a subtly sweet finish emerges alongside an intoxicating room note. experience the maximum in sophistication and refinement from a celebrated dominican-made gem today.

arturo fuente claro sports a bright green candela wrapper leaf in a handful of classic fuente formats. the mellow, tasty blend is handcrafted at the esteemed fuente factory in the dominican republic from a creamy amalgam of aged dominican tobaccos. the medium-bodied profile boasts easygoing flavors of grass, freshly brewed green tea, and buttered toast. add a classic candela to your collection today.

arturo fuente chateau fuente is an iconic lineup of cedar-wrapped cigars. handmade in the dominican republic, these cigars come in 3 varieties: natural, maduro and sun grown. the natural features a golden connecticut shade wrapper; the maduro sports a dark connecticut broadleaf wrapper; and the sun grown boasts a spicy ecuador wrapper. the natural and maduro are richly flavored and medium-bodied, while the sun grown is full-bodied, spicy and robust. no matter which varietal you choose, satisfaction is guaranteed from a legendary dominican brand. experience one of the bestselling recipes in the entire arturo fuente portfolio today.

if rarity had a taste, it would taste like anejo! there are only a handful of cigars on planet earth that generate a full-tilt frenzy among true cigar nuts like the fabled arturo fuente anejo. they are relentlessly prized and praised by all who have had the good fortune of smoking one, however, they are notoriously difficult to come by. anejo cigars are rolled to perfection with only the finest aged dominican tobaccos beneath exceptionally rich connecticut broadleaf wrappers patiently aged in cognac barrels. anejo bears a flavor and depth unlike any other cigar on the market. anejos are only available in obscenely limited quantities, however, holt’s is proud to be your one-stop-shop for fabulous deals and supremely rare, hard-to-find cigars. we are always excited to feature anejo throughout the year as quantities are made available. treat yourself to one of the finest and rarest cigars ever rolled!

in the spirit of our early colonial ancestors and founders of the massachusetts bay colony, winthrop is a handcrafted bundle that delivers exceptional flavor for an introductory price. a gingerbread-hued sumatra wrapper embraces a pleasant amalgam of premium cuban sandwich tobaccos from the dominican republic in a handful of classic shapes. notes of cashew, leather, and grain reveal a rich and complex finish that’s tough to beat at the cheapest prices you’ll find anywhere. add winthrop to your weekly cigar regimen when an inexpensive bundle sounds like the perfect companion for your next round of yard work.

villiger white forest is a creamy and stunning follow-up to the bestselling villiger black forest release. white forest is drawn from a golden and glistening connecticut shade wrapper leaf and a premium blend of dominican long-fillers patiently assembled in five attractive sizes. tasting notes of cedar, cashew, and blonde roast coffee display subtle hints of vanilla and oak before a mellow, mild to medium-bodied finish bathes the palate with nutty flavor and aroma. a touch of spice resonates. savor one of the most anticipated gems to hail from the bustling villiger factory in the dominican republic and save big by adding villiger white forest to your collection today.

when you need an affordable bundle with a little more kick than your average golf-course cigar, villiger selecto maduro is a treat. an oily san andres maduro wrapper blankets a medium to full-bodied profile of well-assembled nicaraguan long-fillers. tasting notes of coffee beans, brown sugar, and black pepper arrive in a handful of traditional shapes that burn straight and taste great for less. add a pivotal villiger bundle to the collection in your coolerdor with selecto maduro. holt’s is your one-stop shop for villiger at the lowest prices on planet earth!

mild to medium-bodied bundles like villiger selecto connecticut eagerly satisfy the masses on any afternoon that calls for an inexpensive bundle of handmades. villiger may be better known for its vast portfolio of machine-made smokes and its historic presence in the european market, but in recent years the brand’s handcrafted blends have gained a bit of momentum thanks to a 93-point rating for the company’s la flor de ynclan release and a ‘top 10 cigar’ ranking from cigar aficionado. add the easy-going profile of nuts, toast, and spices villiger selecto connecticut delivers to your coolerdor when you need a simple bundle to take out the door when you’re hanging up a ‘gone fishing’ sign on the outside. an ecuador connecticut wrapper marries a creamy well-made recipe of nicaraguan tobaccos. plus, with villiger’s rock-bottom prices and everyday sub-wholesale discounts, it’s no big deal if you catch a live one and have to drop your smoke overboard until the boat is steady again.

value fanatics have come to prize the villiger brand for premium flavor at a reliable and uber-affordable price point. rated 93 points in cigar aficionado, villiger san’doro colorado furnishes a medium to full-bodied profile, handcrafted in estelí, nicaragua, in a handful of classic shapes. a leathery ecuador habano wrapper covers a sumptuous amalgam of nicaraguan long-filler tobaccos with zesty notes of nuts, cedar and a touch of pepper. top off your coolerdor with a vivacious blend from villiger today.

score villiger san’doro claro for sub-wholesale prices in a trio of classic shapes handcrafted in nicaragua. a golden-blond ecuador connecticut wrapper leaf harnesses a medium-bodied blend of nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos in a nutty, balanced profile. tasting notes of cashews, leather, cedar, and earth layer the palate with easygoing taste and aroma. stockpile a luscious blend from villiger at yard ‘gar prices, today.

villiger la vencedora cranks up the strength a notch with a 94-rated, medium to full-bodied profile drawn from a cuban-seed oscuro wrapper leaf grown in nicaraguan and drafted over meaty interior of all-nicaraguan long-fillers. la vencedora translates to the ‘the victor,’ a testament to the brand’s recent arrival in the premium u.s. cigar market. a spicy profile of leather and wood displays a hint of black licorice and wild grasses.

the curiously named villiger la flor de ynclan, represents a milestone for the brand: it was named one of cigar aficionado’s ‘top 10 cigars of the year’ for 2017. the 93-rated smoke is drafted from an ecuador connecticut wrapper leaf and a hearty recipe of long-filler tobaccos from the dominican republic and nicaragua. notes of molasses, rawhide, coffee beans and white pepper present a luscious profile with a touch of spice! as your ‘#1 source for the lowest prices on villiger in the western hemisphere,’ your pals at holt’s are happy to present villiger’s most prestigious release to date for an earth-shattering value!

european powerhouse cigar-maker villiger blended la capitana to commemorate a spanish galleon that sank during the golden age of piracy nearly 300 years ago, loaded with gold coins and treasure. la capitana emerges from the bottom of the holt’s blowout bin, not unlike a sunken ship’s treasures, for a fraction of its original price. the blend is handmade in nicaragua from a glistening habano wrapper and a rich selection of nicaraguan long-filler tobaccos in a handful of popular shapes. score a medium to full-bodied profile of dark chocolate, citrus, and peppers for a deep discount. you don’t have to dive on a shipwreck to plunder handmade villiger cigars destined for the u.s. premium cigar market. simply add la capitana to the cart and we’ll pull up the anchor on your next order, son!

villiger has been a premium name brand in the world of machine-made cigars for over a century. the bestselling villiger export brand offers smooth, consistent flavors in three distinct wrapper varieties in a small, box-pressed format. villiger export is crafted in switzerland from dry-cured tobaccos. choose your favorite blend from brasil (brazilian wrapper), classic (sumatra wrapper), and maduro (brazilian maduro wrapper). brasil offers a profile of peppers and earth. classic delivers creamy, mild flavors of nuts and coffee. maduro presents bolder notes of dark chocolate and zesty spices. get plenty of flavor and aroma in a concise shape with export.

warehouse eviction! villiger exclusivo usa was originally blended for an elite group of gold-standard brick & mortars across the country in 2021, but every last box has been relocated to the holt’s blowout bin due to woefully lacking demand. while supplies last, we’re unloading villiger’s latest masterpiece into your coolerdor for pennies on the dollar. save up to 63% off msrp on a trio of handmade gems originally slated to sell for up to fifteen bucks apiece! an attractive cuban-seed nicaraguan wrapper conceals vintage nicaraguan long-fillers from head to foot. succulent notes of leather, almond, coffee bean, and cocoa mingle with a strong undercurrent of espresso and spices before a medium to full-bodied finish layers the palate. they say it takes a villiger to roll a closeout, so get yours from holt’s for the cheapest prices in the country before the blowout buzzards pick the carcass clean, son!

villiger do brasil maduro hails from brazil and is villiger’s first handmade long-filler cigar crafted entirely from brazilian tobaccos. a robust profile of coffee and graham cracker reveals toasty notes of earth and mesquite in a medium to full-bodied profile. brazilian tobaccos are rolled in a handful of cigars, but it’s rare to encounter a cigar that’s composed exclusively of brazilian leaves. villiger do brasil maduro is covered in a dark and hearty wrapper in a pair of classic shapes that emanate with a smoky and sharp intensity.

villiger do brasil claro is blended entirely from brazilian tobaccos, including its light-colored wrapper leaf. tasting notes of grain, white pepper, and oak with a touch of citrus meld in an elegant, easygoing profile you can smoke any time of the day. the folks at villiger have been working with brazilian tobacco for decades, but villiger do brasil is the brand’s first handcrafted long-filler blend made entirely in the south american nation where the tobacco is grown. discover a new take on brazilian tobacco in a unique, medium-bodied cigar.

indulge in a creamy, luscious profile from european-based, value brand villiger. a silky ecuador connecticut wrapper gently hugs a sumptuous combination of dominican binder and filler tobaccos in villiger cuellar kreme. generous notes of toasted cashews, coffee with cream and a touch of spice divulge superb aromas and a mild to medium-bodied finish. spend a day in the backyard hammock, or start your morning off with a smooth and approachable blend from villiger.

villiger chairman heinrich villiger grew up near germany’s majestic black forest. to pay homage to the region’s legendary beauty, the brand unveils villiger cuellar black forest. an oily san andrés wrapper leaf embraces a premium recipe of dominican binder and filler tobaccos in a medium to full-bodied profile. a sweet and earthy portrait of leather, coffee beans, and spices emerges in a handful of classic shapes handmade in the dominican republic. add premium villiger cigars to your collection for a fraction of the original asking price. villiger is the first brand curmudgeonly connoisseurs turn to for earth-shattering value, exquisite taste, and unbeatable consistency.

villiger cabarete was recently re-blended and re-packaged at discounts your piggy bank is guaranteed to remember. a tough case of demand-paralysis practically halted the villiger bandwagon in its tracks as the european powerhouse struggled mightily to penetrate the u.s. premium cigar market. although the company propelled tasty projects like villiger cabarete into brick and mortar smokeshops, the brand landed hard in the blowout bin thanks to preposterous retail prices no one would pay. your pals at holt’s lent a helping hand to the folks at villiger by scooping up their entire cabarete inventory and torching it like a 5-alarm fire. handmade in the dominican republic, cabarete offers a medium-bodied profile of nuts, spices, cream and dark chocolate. take advantage of our rock-bottom prices on bundles of villiger cabarete today!

score boxes of villiger 1888 for an insane sub-wholesale discount. villiger 1888 delivers a mild to medium-bodied profile of nuts, white pepper, wheat toast, and coffee with cream. a silky ecuador connecticut wrapper enrobes a balanced core of long-filler tobaccos from the dominican republic, nicaragua, and mexico’s san andrés region. villiger has been a behemoth in europe for decades as a maker of cigarillos but breaking into the premium u.s. market has been more of an uphill battle. the secret to villiger’s success is deep discounts. scoop up a 90-rated handmade gem at rock-bottom prices in handful of classic shapes. savor the taste and aroma of one of villiger’s early hits at the lowest prices in the country and impress your cigar-pilfering pals without delay!

villiger’s roots originate many decades ago in europe as a maker of machine-made cigars, but the brand has gotten more attention for its handmade portfolio thanks to a 93-point rating and a ‘top 10 cigar’ ranking from cigar aficionado for its la flor de ynclan release. today, a ton of bargain-hunting bundle lovers pick up villiger for the consistent flavor and unbelievably low, rock-bottom prices the brand offers. villiger 125 habano is a shining example with an oily, caramel-hued cuban-seed wrapper grown in ecuador and an all-nicaraguan core. a bit of peppery spice is revealed in a medium-bodied profile of leather, earth, and woody notes. villiger 125 habano makes for a great utility smoke when you’re mowing the lawn or tasked with supplying handouts for your pals on poker night. add villiger to your everyday arsenal and enjoy the steepest discounts in the industry!

viking village is handcrafted in the dominican republic for unflinching value vultures who crave consistent taste and aroma with rugged rock-bottom discounts applied to the prices. fire up a mellow amalgam of dominican tobaccos under a light-brown connecticut shade wrapper leaf in a handful of classic shapes for an entry-level price per cigar. viking village is an easy handout when cigar-pilfering pals invade your man cave, or you need a cheap bundle to tide you over when you’re shoveling the snow or pushing the lawnmower around. welcome to valhalla, son!

produced in the domincan republic, vega fina is hand-made next to some of the biggest names you know, such as montecristo and romeo y julieta. this mild masterpiece uses tobacco from all over the world and carries distinct notes of almonds, cream and a touch of sweet caramel.

cuban-heritage brand trinidad reveals its first-ever dominican puro with santiago, a medium to full-bodied recipe of handcrafted tobaccos, all grown in the dominican republic. notes of cocoa, spices, leather, and nuts converge in a handful of classic shapes that elicit satisfaction from the senses. taste a classic cuban brand name’s take on dominican tobaccos with a boutique release calibrated for the seasoned connoisseur.

top hat takes the cake when you need a tasty bundle that’s easy on the pocketbook. top hat is handcrafted in the dominican republic from a consistent amalgam of cuban-sandwich-style tobaccos under an oily, dark-tan connecticut shade wrapper. a mild to medium-bodied profile of baking spices, nuts, and cocoa commands the sense like a conductor for a price-walloping discount! grab a pleasant-smoking 20-count bundle of top hat, the official yard ‘gar of aristocrats, son!

the tabernacle havana seed ct 142 by foundation cigar company hails from the aj fernandez factory in estelí, nicaragua, but foundation brand founder nick melillo is the man behind the recipe. the original tabernacle blend boasts a beefy connecticut broadleaf wrapper, while havana seed ct 142 is drawn from a hybrid cuban-seed sun grown wrapper, cultivated in connecticut, over an ample san andres binder filled out by nicaraguan and honduran long-fillers. a medium-bodied profile of dark cocoa, cinnamon, clove, almond, cashew, and pepper meld before a damp finish of licorice and wood. add a complex, small-batch blend to your rotation with the latest iteration of the tabernacle from foundation cigars.

the tabernacle by foundation cigar company is handcrafted at the aj fernandez factory in estelí, nicaragua. foundation brand founder nick melillo selected a dark and oily connecticut broadleaf wrapper over a hearty a san andrés binder with long-fillers from estelí, jalapa, and honduras tucked inside when he was assembling ingredients for the tabernacle. robust notes of wood, cocoa, leather, and pepper precede a sweet and lingering finish with loads of smoky aroma. the critics in cigar aficionado rated the tabernacle 90 points following its debut. add a small-batch smoke to your collection and taste one of nick melillo’s most popular cigars.

the griffin’s brand fills a core role in the illustrious portfolio of davidoff cigars as the finest gargoyle-themed cigar in existence. value vultures and blowout buzzards circle the holt’s site in droves eyeing our deep discounts and jaw-droppings savings on the griffin’s cigars. medium-bodied notes of creamy pepper and almonds are readily apparent courtesy of a papery connecticut wrapper over a savory blend of dominican binder and filler tobaccos. bring home all of the top-shelf flavors in a davidoff cigar for the paltry price tag of the griffin’s today!

tatuaje tuxtla cigars are named for the mexican city that’s central to the country’s primary tobacco-growing region in san andrés. tatuaje tuxtla cigars are finished in a dark and oily san andrés wrapper leaf, and each size is a variation of a previous small-batch tatuaje cigar. the tuxtla avion 13 is a hearty perfecto, based on the avion 13 blend, and is drawn from full-bodied nicaraguan long-fillers that pulse with notes of pepper, earth, and leather. the tuxtla 7th is the original tatuaje seleccion de cazador 7th blend, which delivers earthy notes of dark chocolate, coffee, and nuts with a distinctive spice courtesy of the san andrés wrapper. and, the tuxtla t110 is a sweeter and spicier version of the original tatuaje t100 profile, which is characterized by notes of almond, cinnamon, and bread. brand founder pete johnson has been working with award-winning cigar-makers pepin and jaime garcia for two decades. savor their latest small-batch project in an iconic san andrés wrapper.

tattoo by tatuaje cigars is an economically priced cigar created by pete johnson and produced by jose 'pepin' garcia in esteli, nicaragua. a pristine, silky ecuador habano wrapper ensconces a well-aged assemblage of nicaraguan core components that emit resoundingly rich notes of espresso and red pepper with a muted spice and earthiness on the finish.

tatuaje nuevitas has been reintroduced by tatuaje brand found pete johnson, however, the cigar is now made by the esteemed garcia family in estelí, nicaragua. the blend’s original full-bodied profile remains intact with a succulent corojo-seed wrapper harvested in nicaraguan and an all-nicaraguan interior of binder and filler tobaccos. tatuaje nuevitas jibaro delivers the cigar’s complex spices with a sweet finish in a pair of classic shapes that handmade with a shaggy foot. notes of leather, wood, and earth feature prominently.

tatuaje brand founder pete johnson has reintroduced tatuaje nuevitas in its original full-bodied profile, now blended and handcrafted by the legendary jose ‘pepin’ garcia in estelí, nicaragua. a peppery corojo-seed wrapper grown in nicaragua harbors an all-nicaraguan core of binder and filler tobaccos that deliver plenty of complex spices that transition into a sweet finish with notes of earth, leather, and wood.

tatauaje’s sought-after monster series cigars return in 2022 with the drac redux 2, a 6.75-by-52 belicoso, which is a nod to the original drac from 2009. tatuaje monster cigars are handmade in esteli, nicaragua, where they’re blended by pete and the award-winning garcia family. an oily ecuador habano wrapper encapsulates a vigorous blend of premium nicaraguan long-fillers with a closed foot. sink your fangs into a full-bodied smoke blended to commemorate dracula with an intense profile of earth, leather, and black pepper with hints of molasses and peat. the finish is hearty and chewy with loads of spice. tatuaje brand founder pete johnson unveiled the first monster series cigars in 2009. every year these limited-production cigars come in coveted coffin boxes of 13 that sell out fast. only 4,000 total boxes were made this year, so get yours before the tatuaje fanatics claw their way to the bottom of our inventory. ha, ha, ha!

tatuaje hcs maduro is a passionate collaboration between 'tattoo' pete johnson, jose 'pepin' garcia and the one and only, team holt's. this ultra-limited, uber-deluxe, top-shelf beauty is handcrafted with the utmost precision by pepin garcia in esteli, nicaragua in pepin's  world-famous, state-of-the-art cigar palace.  drafted using a wonderful  blend of aged nicaraguan long-fillers, these small-batch gems are medium  to full-bodied with a rich, earthy flavor-core that boasts enchanting  notes of sweet cedar, creamy leather and spicy pepper.  attention  tatuaje nation, rare cigar collectors and 'peteopians' worldwide - you  won't find a better deal on tatuaje cigars anywhere but holt's!

tatuaje hcs is a limited-production masterpiece brought to us by ‘tattoo’ pete johnson and jose ‘pepin’ garcia. handcrafted in pepin’s world-renowned nicaraguan-based factory, tatuaje hcs is one of the finest tatuaje offerings ever to be brought to market. a beautiful, silky-smooth ecuador habano wrapper cocoons a glorious blend of well-aged nicaraguan long-fillers. full-bodied in strength, these cigars showcase a complex flavor-bouquet including notes of cedar, pepper, leather, spice and rich dark earth. available in three select sizes with a soft cuban-style box-pressed finish, these cigars are absolute must-try for fine cigar connoisseurs everywhere.

tatuaje havana vi verocu blue is a small-batch line blended from an oily corojo rosado wrapper leaf over a medium to full-bodied interior of premium nicaraguan long-fillers aged for maximum smoothness. tatuaje brand founder pete johnson enlists the expertise of celebrated father-and-son cigar-makers pepin and jaime garcia to blend and produce havana vi verocu blue cigars. a beefy profile of spices, coffee bean, earth, and nuts layers the palate before an intense finish of mesquite and cocoa resonates with a complex sweetness. add a peppery and well-rounded smoke from tatuaje to your rotation today.

tatuaje havana vi verocu has shed its skin as a limited edition release, and is now available as a regular production cigar. handcrafted in nicaragua, havana vi verocu features an oily ecuador habano wrapper over a bold combination of nicaraguan long-filler tobaccos with a medium to full-bodied profile of earthy spices and notes of coffee and cocoa. verocu offers a rich finish with a well-constructed delivery of peppery flavors. for fans of tatuaje, verocu is a welcome addition to your lineup with a nice variety of formats.

tatuaje havana vi is another winning collaboration between pete johnson and the garcia family. handcrafted in nicaragua, tatuaje havana vi features a reddish-hued ecuador habano wrapper over a beautiful all-nicaraguan long-filler blend. lovely notes of cedar, leather, pepper and nutmeg marry in a solid medium-bodied profile. enjoy the perfect construction and gratifying aromas of tatuaje havana vi today.

tatuaje el triunfador original reveals a classic cubanesque profile of molasses, cocoa, and black pepper in a handful of traditional shapes. a succulent connecticut broadleaf wrapper blankets an all-nicaraguan interior of binder and filler tobaccos blended by the esteemed garcia family in estelí, nicaragua. tatauaje brand founder pete johnson built his following on small-batch boutique smokes like el triunfador in the interest of impressing connoisseurs who prefer a combination of intensity and balance. premium tobaccos have been patiently aged at the garcia family’s nicaraguan factory to deliver a unique and refined profile.

tatuaje black was originally developed by pete johnson for his personal stash but with such rave reviews and high demand pete ramped-up production in order to satiate the demand of loyal, die-hard fans. made under the watchful eye of jose ''pepin'' garcia in nicaragua, tatuaje black is produced with the utmost care and precision. this nicaraguan puro uses some of the finest fillers and binder leaves on the planet and is clothed in a gorgeous dark chocolaty-colored wrapper. tatuaje black is dark and rich with a tremendous taste that leaves the palate engaged with notes of espresso, leather and pepper and zero harshness.

it’s hard to believe brand founder pete johnson introduced tatuaje 15 years ago. the l.a. rock n’ roller spearheaded a steady craze for potent boutique smokes handcrafted from nicaraguan tobaccos when he enlisted the vast cigar-making talents of the garcia family to blend his brand back in the early 2000s. tatuaje 15th anniversary commemorates the brand’s decade and a half in business with a full-bodied nicaraguan profile handmade from a cuban-seed rosado wrapper grown in ecuador and a rich interior of all-nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos. spicy, woody, and intense flavors display notes of coffee beans and leather throughout a supreme finish in handful of classic shapes.

celebrate a decade and a half of premium cigar making from one of the original boutique brands to emerge from nicaragua with tatuaje 15th anniversary oscuro. brand founder pete johnson teamed up with the garcia family back in the early 2000s to blend the first commercially successful tatuaje cigars. tatuaje 15th anniversary oscuro delivers a full-bodied recipe with a cuban-seed oscuro wrapper cultivated in ecuador and a supreme core of nicaraguan long-fillers. potent and peppery notes of fresh ground espresso, dark chocolate, and cayenne boast a smooth and meaty finish.

to celebrate 10 blockbuster years for the tatuaje brand, the man behind tatuaje cigars, 'tattoo' pete johnson, created tatuaje 10th anniversary. these limited edition cigars are special versions of his seleccion de cazador brown label that showcase a tweaked blend and commemorative packaging. like all tatuaje cigars, they are produced by jose 'pepin' garcia utilizing a sumptuous bouquet of well-aged nicaraguan tobaccos and an extra-oily ecuadorian habano wrapper that produces a powerful, earthy spice with a solid backbone of cocoa, leather and cinnamon on the finish.

tatuaje is a fantastic cigar created by 'tattoo' pete johnson and the garcia family. handmade in the heart of little havana, these beauties feature a choice blend of aged nicaraguan tobaccos draped inside gorgeous, dark-brown ecuadorian habano wrappers. full-bodied in strength, these cigars are earthy and spicy with beautiful notes of cedar and leather. smoke one and you’re guaranteed to be hooked - they’re that good.

tatiana is one of the world’s leading flavored cigar brands. crafted in the dominican republic, these tasty treats sport consistent construction and mouthwatering flavors and aromas. available in a wide selection of flavors, tatiana cigars are sweet, smooth and delicious!

tatiana is one of the world’s leading flavored cigar brands. crafted in the dominican republic, these tasty treats sport consistent construction and mouthwatering flavors and aromas. available in a wide selection of flavors, tatiana cigars are sweet, smooth and delicious!

tabak especial is a lovely, gourmet-infused cigar by drew estate. handmade in nicaragua, these cigars are coffee-infused and boast a rich cache of sweet flavors paired with a decadent room-note. available in natural (dulce) and maduro (negra) wrappers, these savory cigars are finished with sugar-dunked tips. the dulce carries a sweet, creamy essence, while the negra is influenced heavily by its rich, mocha-like character. all in all, this cigar is another winner from the kings of infusion, drew estate.

cuban-style sandwich tobaccos have never been blended more indulgently than in tabacos baez serie sf. patiently drafted in the world-famous my father factory in estelí, nicaragua, under the watchful eye of legendary cigar-maker jose ‘pepin’ garcia, tabacos baez sf is a glistening nicaraguan puro. a medium-bodied profile of coffee beans and leather with a velvety texture satisfies the palate in a handful of traditional shapes for an amazing value.

surrogates is an edgy, lifestyle brand concocted by 'tattoo' pete johnson and the l'atelier crew out of los angeles, california. hailing from nicaragua, these cigars are manufactured by the legendary jose 'pepin' garcia. in unconventional fashion, each size of surrogates exhibits a unique name, blend and band. strength ranges from medium to full-bodied offering pronounced notes of spice, earth, cedar and warm molasses.

data.cigar_name: southern draw rose of sharon desert rose
data.cigar_description: southern draw rose of sharon desert rose cigars are named for sharon holt, wife of southern draw brand founder robert holt. a golden-blond ecuador connecticut wrapper leaf encapsulates a complex core of dominican and honduran long-fillers tucked within a nicaraguan binder. tasting notes of cedar, nuts, and fresh bread weave silky textures over the palate before a mellow finish with hints of white pepper punctuates the end. southern draw cigars are blended and handcrafted at the aj fernandez factory in estelí, nicaragua.

southern draw rose of sharon is blended by aj fernandez from an ecuador connecticut wrapper and a complex core of dominican and nicaraguan long-fillers tucked inside a nicaraguan binder. tasting notes of leather, white pepper, and oak layer the palate with velvety texture before an earthy and succulent finish. hints of spice punctuate the profile from beginning to end in a handful of popular sizes. rose of sharon is named for sharon holt, the wife of southern draw brand founder robert holt. savor a small-batch smoke handmade at the aj fernandez factory in estelí, nicaragua.

southern draw kudzu cigars hail from the hands of talented cigar rollers at the sprawling aj fernandez factory in estelí, nicaragua, where they’re blended for southern draw brand founder robert holt. kudzu is drafted from an oily cuban-seed oscuro wrapper grown in ecuador and a medium to full-bodied blend of well-aged nicaraguan long-fillers. sweet and zesty notes of black pepper, toffee, coffee bean, and molasses mingle with hints of nuts and wood. the critics in cigar aficionado rated southern draw kudzu 92 points for its smooth and complex profile. choose from a collection of classic sizes rolled with a closed foot for an extra-flavorful intro when you first fire one up.

southern draw jacob’s ladder brimstone is a slightly stronger version of the original jacob’s ladder blend, courtesy of a hearty broadleaf binder grown in the u.s. a dark and lustrous pennsylvania broadleaf wrapper hugs a robust blend of premium long-fillers, from the dominican republic and nicaragua, which rest inside an american-grown broadleaf binder. jacob’s ladder brimstone opens with plenty of black pepper and wood before a smoky and sweet profile of raisin and chocolate culminates in a nutty finish with hints of molasses. southern draw jacob’s ladder brimstone is handcrafted at the aj fernandez factory in estelí, nicaragua. taste another small-batch gem from aj rated 90 points by the critics in cigar aficionado.

southern draw cigars hail from esteemed cigar-maker aj fernandez in estelí, nicaragua. jacob’s ladder is blended from a dark and oily pennsylvania broadleaf wrapper over an ecuador binder and nicaraguan long-fillers in a collection of savory sizes. succulent notes of molasses and coffee bean mingle with creamy hints of cedar and spice before long, malty, and full-bodied finish. taste the distinction an authentic pennsylvania broadleaf wrapper leaf imparts in a small-batch blend from one of today’s most popular nicaraguan cigar-makers.

southern draw firethorn cigars are handcrafted at the aj fernandez factory in estelí, nicaragua, in a collection of handmade classics. an ecuador habano rosado wrapper leaf embraces an intricate blend of cuban-seed long-filler tobaccos, from nicaragua, tucked inside a binder from san andrés. notes of almond, cashew, caramel, and cocoa mingle before an earthy and woody finish envelops the palate. add a small-batch smoke from southern draw to your humidor when you’re craving a distinctive profile blended by renowned cigar-maker aj fernandez.

southern draw cedrus is a small-batch brand handcrafted in estelí, nicaragua, by aj fernandez for brand founder robert holt. cedrus gets its name from the type of wood cigar boxes are made from, cedrus libani, which imparts a desirable flavor and aroma when cigars age in cedar boxes. an oily indonesia wrapper leaf covers an eventful blend of long-filler tobaccos, including dominican piloto cubano, nicaraguan criollo ’98, nicaraguan habano ’92, and nicaraguan corojo ’99. a consistent profile of coffee bean, leather, toffee, caramel, and spices earned a 91-point rating from the critics in cigar aficionado. add a boutique blend, originally intended as a limited edition, from southern draw to you collection when you choose from a handful of classic sizes.

smokin’ sandwich cigars are named for the cuban-sandwich-style tobaccos they’re made from. when you need a reliable and cheap bundle to toss in your lunch box, smokin’ sandwich burns straight and delivers decent flavor in a mild to medium-bodied profile of wood, leather, and coffee bean notes. a silky reddish-brown sumatra wrapper leaf conceals a creamy sandwich blend of nicaraguan tobaccos in a trio of classic shapes. put a 20-count bundle on your yard ‘gar shopping list without making a dent in your monthly cigar budget!

savoy presents a wonderfully approachable medium-bodied profile of nuts, toast and coffee with cream. introduce an excellent blend of all-dominican binder and filler tobaccos beneath an elegant connecticut shade wrapper into your daily rotation. savoy is patiently handcrafted in the dominican republic. enjoy a premium, flavorful experience for an exceptional value.

data.cigar_name: san lotano oval maduro by aj fernandez
data.cigar_description: after having incredible success with the launch of san lotano oval, aj fernandez decided to release a maduro version of this spectacular cigar and has added another prize to his collection. oval maduro is comprised of the same top-notch fillers and binder as its predecessor but is draped in a shimmering connecticut broadleaf wrapper. this medium to full-bodied cigar offers up enticing notes of elegant spices, rich cocoa and a touch of pepper that intertwines with perfect balance on the palate for a long delightful finish. this my friends is a truly wonderful follow-up to an already excellent cigar and is a must-try for not only a.j. fernandez fans but for all smokers.

data.cigar_name: san lotano oval connecticut by aj fernandez
data.cigar_description: popular boutique cigar-maker aj fernandez gained a wave of admirers with his original release of san lotano oval. noted for its distinctive oval shape and hearty nicaraguan flavor, now you can experience this unique concept with an enhanced approachability in san lotano oval connecticut. handcrafted in nicaragua, the mild to medium-bodied profile includes notes of almonds, cedar, nutmeg, and creamy spices. a golden-blond connecticut wrapper leaf hugs an eventful blend of nicaraguan and honduran long-filler tobaccos in a handful of classic shapes pressed into aj fernandez’s signature oval profile.

data.cigar_name: san lotano oval by aj fernandez
data.cigar_description: hailing from nicaragua, san lotano oval uses a sensational habano wrapper, a premium nicaraguan binder and excellent nicaraguan and honduran fillers that offer up flavors of cognac and leather with just the right hint of spice. with its unique eye-catching oval shape, this cigar is a truly distinguished blend with great balance.

data.cigar_name: san lotano maduro by aj fernandez
data.cigar_description: san lotano maduro is made in nicaragua by aj fernandez. the nicaraguan and honduran fillers release a smooth earthiness while the dark and oily maduro wrapper produces a sweet spice that rolls on to the palate with a velvety touch. san lotano maduro is a medium-to-full bodied cigar that engages the smoker with first-class complexity that keeps you wanting more.

data.cigar_name: san lotano habano by aj fernandez
data.cigar_description: san lotano habano by aj fernandez is blended for the full-bodied cigar enthusiast. by using only high-quality fillers, the habano is powerful yet entirely balanced with a rich and hearty zest leading to a long finish. the most distinctive feature of the habano blend is its rare cuban seed ligero wrapper grown only in brazil.

data.cigar_name: san lotano dominicano by aj fernandez
data.cigar_description: san lotano dominicano is handmade in the dominican republic and blended by boutique cigar-maker aj fernandez. a reddish-brown brazilian wrapper leaf embraces a medium-bodied recipe of dominican and nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos in a collection of traditional shapes. tasting notes of fresh ground coffee, caramel, licorice, and cocoa beans emerge before a toasted finish. the blend scored three 90-plus-point ratings in a vertical tasting in cigar aficionado in 2019, including 93 points for the san lotano dominicano torpedo. stock the coolerdor with small-batch boutiques from aj fernandez today.

san cristobal revelation is blended from a milk-chocolate-hued ecuador sumatra wrapper and a vibrant blend of premium nicaraguan long-fillers aged to perfection by award-winning cigar-maker jose ‘pepin’ garcia. creamy and complex notes of smoked almond, cedar, cinnamon, and cocoa are punctuated by elegant hints of black pepper in a collection that includes soft box-pressed sizes and big ring formats. revelation blesses the palate with a luscious medium-bodied finish guaranteed to please a wide variety of tastes. add a 92-rated classic from san cristobal to your humidor today.

indulge in the stunning profile of san cristobal quintessence, ranked the ‘#3 cigar of the year’ and rated 95 points in cigar aficionado in 2021! world-renowned cigar-maker jose ‘pepin’ garcia blends quintessence from the finest binder and filler tobaccos grown on garcia family estates and a luscious ecuador habano wrapper in a collection of classic formats. savory tasting notes of cedar, molasses, coffee bean, and cocoa captivate the palate with hints of sweetness and silky, complex aromas. ample spices emerge in a medium to full-bodied finish. san cristobal quintessence exemplifies pepin’s award-winning reputation in a top-rated nicaraguan blend aged and handcrafted in estelí, nicaragua.

san cristobal ovation is drawn from an especially rare san andrés oscuro wrapper and a bold blend of premium nicaraguan long-fillers assembled by legendary cigar-maker jose ‘pepin’ garcia in estelí, nicaragua. ovation is an exclusive, small-batch blend comprised of the finest and rarest tobaccos grown on garcia family estates. the cigar’s dark and oily oscuro wrapper emerges from an intensive two-and-a-half-year double fermentation to reveal a full-bodied, captivating richness. notes of dark chocolate, hickory, cedar, maple, and black pepper mingle in a potent but incredibly smooth profile. ovation resonates with an abundant finish in a purely decadent and perfectly balanced collection.

san cristobal elegancia offers a marvelous introduction to nicaraguan tobaccos for cigar lovers traditionally accustomed to a milder profile. world-renowned cigar-maker jose ‘pepin’ garcia blends elegancia from a silky, golden-blond ecuador connecticut wrapper over a perfectly aged pairing of nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos. tasting notes of white pepper, cashew, almond, and coffee bean culminate in a mild to medium-bodied profile with creamy texture. relish a luscious gem with a velvety finish from san cristobal in a series of popular sizes today.

san cristobal is a classic, 93-rated nicaraguan cigar blended by award-winning cigar-maker jose ‘pepin’ garcia. a lustrous, dark-brown ecuador habano oscuro wrapper covers a bold, balanced blend of premium aged nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos grown on select garcia family estates. tasting notes of dark chocolate, black pepper, espresso bean, black cherry, and walnut captivate the senses in a collection of flawless formats handmade in the garcia family’s modern cigar factory in estelí, nicaragua. pepin’s trademark zest impresses with bold aromas before a lavish finish arrives in a collection of popular shapes. indulge in a luxurious profile renowned for its unrivaled flavor with san cristobal today.

saint luis rey is a gem for value-minded cigar lovers looking for a unique, medium to full-bodied blend that stands out with a bit of complexity. handcrafted in honduras, saint luis rey is available in your choice of a delicious nicaraguan (natural) wrapper, or an earthier san andrés (maduro) wrapper. an intricate combination of nicaraguan, honduran and peruvian long-filler tobaccos populate the interior of saint luis rey to offer an approachable profile that has a bit of kick and is easy to enjoy. flawless construction provides an effortless draw with rounded notes of butterscotch, peppers, nuts and wood. the toothy finish entices the palate with a flavorful aftertaste and an envious aroma. fortify the offerings in your humidor with a solid go-to cigar by ordering saint luis rey today!

fans of nicaraguan smokes who love to puff away at their heart’s content without the worry that they’re burning through a twenty-dollar bill adore rosa cuba. a gingerbread-hued ecuador sumatra wrapper embraces a premium cuban-sandwich blend of zesty nicaraguan tobaccos handmade in a wide variety of traditional shapes. budget-friendly 20-count bundles of rosa cuba go for the lowest cigar prices you’ll find anywhere, and they deliver resplendent notes of coffee bean, toasted nuts, cedar, and peppery spices. roam the driving range or drive the lawn tractor for days with a rosa cuba in your mouth when you want the taste of a great utility cigar that doesn’t stretch out your cigar allowance like spandex pants on a rhino.

sophisticated and refined, romeo y julieta vintage deals up creamy flavors that are smooth, nutty and totally devoid of any harshness. well-aged, vintage tobaccos from the dominican republic and mexico are wrapped together with a creamy ecuador connecticut wrapper to form this mild, mellow brand of romeo.

after tapping a collaboration with cigar-makers aj fernandez and rafael nodal, the makers of romeo y julieta reveal a medium to full-bodied profile that edges the historic cuban-legacy franchise in a new direction with romeo y julieta san andrés. as its name implies, a toothy and succulent san andrés wrapper leaf encapsulates an earthy core of dominican and nicaraguan long-filler tobaccos. bold, earthy flavors of cedar, roasted chestnuts, leather, and fresh ground coffee traverse a handful of classic, well-balanced shapes.

romeo y julieta 505 nicaragua is sheathed in a lustrous nicaraguan wrapper leaf over a medium to full-bodied amalgam of all-nicaraguan long-fillers. a handful of classic shapes deliver chewy and leathery textures with notes of toasted chestnuts, black pepper, cedar, and sweetened black berries. add a more potent, but balanced, 91-rated romeo to your rotation today.

as your preferred source for deep discounts and cigar deals galore, we always have a generous selection of romeo y julieta cigars on hand in our palatial, humidified warehouse. romeo by romeo y julieta seduces more cigar connoisseurs than a shakespearean sonnet with sincere notes of leather, chocolate and earth. sultry ecuador wrappers usher in sweet and savory flavors over an amalgam of dominican binder and filler tobaccos. order your romeo by romeo y julieta today and experience the latest evolution in a classic brand!

romeo y julieta reserve maduro is a unique and flavorful creation. a dark, sultry connecticut broadleaf wrapper cloaks a rich blend of dominican, nicaraguan and peruvian tobaccos. medium-bodied in strength, these cigars exude a rich foundation of warm, earthy flavors laced with notes of espresso and cocoa.

romeo y julieta reserve cigars deliver hints of leather, nuts, and nougat with a hint of cinnamon in a 90-rated profile. an oily caramel-hued nicaraguan wrapper leaf embraces a well-blended interior of nicaraguan and honduran binder and filler tobaccos in a collection of popular sizes. romeo y julieta reserve cigars are handmade in honduras by expert cigar rollers. taste the evolution of a classic cuban-legacy brand with the medium to full-bodied flavor and aroma romeo y julieta reserve cigars offer for a great price.

romeo y julieta reserva real is an excellent cigar that displays a surprisingly rich character given it’s medium-bodied temperament. nicaraguan and dominican long-fillers provide a rich cedary platform for the connecticut-ecuador wrapper to launch its elaborate tapestry of toasty and nutty flavors. a pleasant but not overpowering spice is also injected into the mix by the wrapper and rounds the cigar out on the back-end quite nicely.

fans of the best-known cuban-legacy brand, romeo y julieta, have an enticing medium-bodied profile to add to their collection with romeo y julieta 1875 nicaragua. spicy coffee bean and cedar notes display a toasted nuttiness in a caramel-hued nicaraguan wrapper leaf and an all-nicaraguan interior of binder and filler tobaccos blended in a handful of classic shapes. romeo y julieta has been lauded by connoisseurs and novices for years. tradition, reputation and balance converge in a complex but approachable cigar. taste the evolution of a world-famous brand in a succulent nicaraguan puro today.

romeo y julieta 1875 is a classic, iconic brand popular with a wide range of cigar lovers thanks to a sumptuous blend of dominican long-fillers beneath a caramel-hued indonesian wrapper. take your pick from a great selection of formats. notes of toasted nuts, peppers and coffee offer a balanced mild to medium-bodied finish. approachable flavor, perfect construction and irresistible aromas characterize the delicious reputation of romeo y julieta 1875.

rocky patel vintage 2006 delivers a classic, medium to full-bodied profile of dark chocolate, earth and sweet spices. an extensively aged wrapper from san andrés blankets connecticut broadleaf binders and filler tobaccos from nicaragua. a handful of popular formats furnishes signature rocky tasting notes with a perfect burn and awe-inspiring aroma. taste the evolution of rocky’s vintage series today.

rocky patel vintage 2003 employs a rich cameroon wrapper with a dark golden sheen to cover an aged blend of nicaraguan binder tobaccos alongside dominican and nicaraguan long-fillers. a consistent, medium to full-bodied profile offers rich flavors of wood, spices and leather. handcrafted in honduras, each format of vintage 2003 finishes with a rewarding aftertaste and features an excellent burn and seamless construction.

rocky patel vintage 1999 is the mildest cigar in the vast ‘rp’ portfolio. creamy connecticut wrappers are cloaked around an aged blend of dominican and nicaraguan long-fillers with an elegant and approachable profile. ignition brings out a creamy, buttery flavor that ushers in supporting notes of toast and assorted nuts. a cool, effortless draw offers hints of spice with a mild finish and supreme satisfaction.

vintage 1992 is handcrafted in honduras and remains one of rocky patel’s original, bestselling blends. vintage 1992 is composed of the same enticing blend of dominican and nicaraguan long-filler tobaccos as rocky’s vintage 1990. however, the vintage 1992 features an aged ecuador sumatra wrapper for a distinctly different profile. hearty notes of almonds, cashews and toasty spices are perfectly balanced throughout a creamy finish with hints of earth. taste one of the cigars that continues to define rocky’s reputation as a creative and consistent blender.

rocky patel vintage 1990 is a staple in rocky’s vast portfolio of cigar brands. handmade in honduras, rich broadleaf wrappers envelop a smooth blend of dominican and nicaraguan long-fillers. a medium-bodied profile of cocoa, cedar, earth and sweet spices is presented in cool, copious draws that satisfy from beginning to end. vintage 1990 has received a nice number of 90+ ratings and remains one of the bestselling bedrock cigars that put rocky on the map.

rocky patel velvet edition is one of the smoothest cigars on the market. crafted with silky, sumptuous ecuador connecticut wrappers, velvet edition also contains a mellow, mouthwatering blend of aged nicaraguan tobaccos. medium-bodied in strength, these luxurious handmades release a pleasant earthy aroma which transitions into a steady stream of creamy, nutty nuances tinged with notes of oak and coffee beans. the finish is smooth, subtle and satisfying. velvet edition is perfect for cigar lovers looking for an approachable and delicious blend to enjoy any time of the day.

rocky patel’s top-selling honduran-made franchise called the edge includes the edge sumatra. a lustrous ecuador sumatra wrapper leaf is draped over a spicy amalgam of nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos. the full-bodied profile includes notes of wood, black pepper, earth, and leather with a hearty density and aroma. enjoy rocky patel the edge sumatra in a handful of classic shapes guaranteed to burn perfectly and wake your senses with abundant flavor and complexity.

the edge lite is basically a milder, smoother version of the regular edge. comprised of a comparable long-filler blend and finished with a creamy ecuador connecticut wrapper, the edge lite features a more approachable, less potent profile with plenty of rich flavors. medium-bodied notes of caramel, leather and cedar offer a graceful conclusion that satisfies without knocking cigar lovers off their socks with an overwhelming punch. get the edge lite when you’re looking for a bit of refined balance.

rocky patel the edge habano is the first cigar from the edge franchise that features wrapper, binder and fillers hailing from nicaragua. a full-bodied profile provides hints of black cherries, figs and earthy spices alongside robust notes of cocoa and peppers with a copious draw and full-flavored complexity. the edge habano captivates from start to finish and concludes with a punchy, balanced and rewarding aftertaste.

rocky patel has made an addition to the the edge lineup in the form of a toothy, light green candela wrapper. although candela wrappers are somewhat rare, they offer a distinctive profile of sweet spices, green tea, and hay with an approachable, buttery finish. a tasty blend of honduran long-fillers resides beneath each iridescent wrapper to compliment the delicate flavors with consistent construction and a perfect draw.

if you’re a fan of rocky patel, and you’re looking to gain an edge that no one else has, we strongly suggest the edge a-10. rocky’s latest incarnation of his best-selling and beloved edge cigars, the a-10 combines the best of both worlds with a barber pole wrapper that marries an oily corojo with a sumptuous maduro leaf in an exquisite toro format. sweet spices, black pepper, earth and nuts build into an enticing finish that is both reminiscent of the original edge blend and completely unique in its own right. the edge a-10 is a limited edition 10-year anniversary cigar perfect for connoisseurs looking for a distinct balance of spicy and sweet flavors.

the edge is one of rocky patel’s best-selling cigars. handmade in honduras, these spice-bombs feature a rich, hearty blend of nicaraguan long-fillers and two luxurious wrapper options. full-bodied to its very core, the edge is an easy go-to cigar for full-bodied fanatics. nicaraguan long-fillers provide an excellent amount of spice in each wrapper variety. depending on your wrapper preference, you can expect rich, leathery flavors with a bit of sweetness from the maduro, or an earthier profile of cedar and spice from the corojo.

like an artist obsessed with perfection, rocky patel is always trying to improve upon his most popular blends and is never satisfied by resting on his laurels. adding to the well-known sun grown line, rocky has reformulated one of his bestsellers with a dark chocolate-hued connecticut broadleaf wrapper over a rich combination of nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos. his efforts definitely paid off with a well-deserved 95-point score in cigar aficionado along with the prestigious ‘#2 cigar of the year’ ranking for 2016. handcrafted in nicaragua, rocky patel sun grown maduro cigars feature a hearty, full-bodied profile of earth, coffee, spicy maple and cedar with a sweet, chocolaty finish. enjoy full flavors and reliable construction from another rocky patel crowd-pleaser.

rocky patel sun grown is now a classic in his ever-expanding arsenal of high-quality cigars. an eclectic blend of full-bodied long-fillers, which includes nicaraguan, dominican and some exotic brazilian tobaccos, provides an excellent foundation for the spicy ecuador sungrown wrapper that caps it all off. sun grown offers a full-bodied profile with a hearty dose of spices, peppers, cedar and leathery finish certain to satisfy cigar lovers who enjoy a nice combination of strength and balance.

rocky patel sixty cigars were blended by brand founder rocky patel to celebrate his 60th birthday in 2021, but the cigars were aged for a solid two years before they were released. the critics at cigar aficionado rated rocky patel sixty 96 points and ranked it as the ‘#2 cigar of the year’ for 2022. a succulent, dark, and oily san andrés wrapper leaf conceals a hearty blend of nicaraguan long-fillers in a trio of box-pressed sizes that resemble fine bars of chocolate. tasting notes of coffee, nuts, and red pepper mingle over a robust foundation of leather, cedar, and hickory. rocky patel sixty cigars are handcrafted at rocky’s tavicusa factory in estelí, nicaragua. savor the highest-rated rocky patel cigar to date when you add the sixty to your collection.

rocky patel royale is handmade in nicaragua and showcases a toothy ecuador sumatra wrapper over a juicy, medium-bodied blend of aged honduran and nicaraguan tobaccos. rich flavors of cedar, earth, leather and almonds are carefully appointed in every puff. with a 94-rating and a creamy finish, royale shows off rocky’s talent at enticing cigar lovers with smooth and complex blends that appeal to every kind of palate.

when it comes to pro football, and sports in general, it can be said that rocky patel is a mega-fan. when it comes to blending cigars for his favorite cigar-loving athletes, rocky’s game is second to none. in his latest homage to the gridiron, rocky teamed up two-time nfl super bowl champion ray lewis to release a medium-bodied limited edition cigar as an homage to the all-pro linebacker’s legendary 17-year career. handmade in honduras, rocky patel ray lewis boasts an oily ecuador habano wrapper over a complex array of long-filler tobaccos from brazil, san andrés, honduras and nicaragua. savory notes of coffee, pepper, cedar and spicy almonds unite in a succulent profile. rub elbows with a legend and enjoy bold aromas and flavor worthy of one of the game’s greatest with rocky patel ray lewis.

ocean club is among rocky patel’s finest, best-selling boutique cigars. this limited-production masterpiece is medium-bodied, boasting a rich, leathery flavor-core and a smooth, creamy finish. a gorgeous, oil-laden nicaraguan wrapper cocoons a toothy mexican binder and a wonderful blend of luscious long-filler tobaccos from the dominican republic and nicaragua. this honduran-made gem packs just the right amount of earthiness and spice to please the palate without becoming overwhelming. is ocean club rocky’s finest cigar to date? find out for yourself!

everybody loves a winner! rocky patel has blended dozens of cigars for iconic athletes in the past, but none celebrate his penchant for glory more so than the esteemed mulligans collection. taste first-place flavors in rocky patel mulligans trophy series! the bestselling mulligans franchise receives a blend that delivers a mild to medium-bodied, creamy profile of nuts, toast, and cedar, reminiscent of rocky patel vintage 1999, for an undefeatable discount. a silky connecticut shade wrapper cradles a marvelous combo of dominican, nicaraguan and peruvian long-fillers. convert your coolerdor into a bona fide trophy case with the rocky patel mulligans trophy series for buzzer-beating discounts in five classic sizes!

rocky patel originally set out to get into the guinness book of world records for biggest production cigar with a gargantuan 6 x 80 format. unfortunately, the immense cost of rolling and shipping the colossal size set in after rocky got a prototype stuck in his mouth. his cigar rollers had already dutifully cranked out a few dozen truckloads and swallowed up practically every square inch of free warehouse space when rocky’s desperate collect call to the holt’s closeout hotline begging for a bailout was answered. we gladly added the bursting new shape to the esteemed rocky patel mulligans franchise and named it snowman, knowing we could easily satisfy the ginormous demand for plus-sized cigars. an ecuador habano wrapper encapsulates a bursting blend of dominican filler tobaccos. a medium to full-bodied profile of peppery figs boasts balanced notes of coffee, cream and leather. it may take a fireplace to light one of these bad boys up, but we can promise you, it’s well worth the wait!

rocky patel mulligans masters collection is the runner-up blend to the rich and regal, 93-rated rocky patel fifty. that’s right folks. these very cigars were a half-step away from boasting the bright orange rocky patel fifty emblem, and being enshrined inside boxes slathered with swarovski crystals. after sampling these cigars, we were downright flabbergasted by the oily, cinnamon-hued habano wrappers and the wonderful blend of aged tobaccos. medium-bodied in strength, these uber-delights produce lovely notes of english toffee, espresso beans, light oak and subtle spice. due to our near and dear relationship with rocky patel, we were able to land these cigars free and clear for pennies on the dollar. the only advice i can give you is order now!

rocky patel’s bestselling golf-themed mulligans brand includes a beloved fumas called the ‘rp’ mulligans lost ball. score a 20-count bundle of premium cuban-sandwich gems packed with luscious dominican and nicaraguan filler tobaccos under your choice of a golden connecticut shade wrapper (blue band) or an oily maduro (orange band) with a massive discount applied to the price. tasting notes of cedar, nuts, and blonde roast coffee characterize the connecticut shade edition, while dark cocoa, maple, and pepper layer the palate in the maduro. rocky proves once again you don’t have to drop loads of cash to get consistent everyday cigars that burn straight and taste great thanks to mild to medium-bodied bundles of mulligans lost ball cigars. add a batch to your coolerdor today, and book your next tee time at the country club, son!

when you need immediate relief from a tough round of golf, but maybe you’re only playing a miniature course, rocky patel mulligans juniors provide a perfect flash of satisfaction. all of the rich and enticing rocky flavors you know and love are wrapped up in a mild blend of dominican binder and filler tobaccos gently tucked under an ecuador sumatra wrapper leaf in a tasty, handcrafted small format. be prepared to unwind at a moment’s notice with tasting notes of toasted nuts, earth, cedar and leathery spices.

as one of the most insightful cigar blenders in the world, rocky patel is always brainstorming for the next prevailing trend among cigar lovers. although rocky has personally created some of the hottest, bestselling brands in the world, his last bright idea was cut short, literally, but only after a few hundred thousand cigars were rolled, banded and ready to ship. enticed by the extreme demand for cigars shaped in a short, stocky format, rocky put his factory into overdrive cranking out an entire line of 4 x 60 beauties. the only issue was that rocky simply didn’t like the way they felt in his hand, after the fact. consequently, he reached out to his pals at holt’s, curious if the fat, compact shape could fit into the esteemed mulligans franchise. of course we said yes! fans of flavorful and efficient 4 x 60 cigars, feast your senses on rocky patel mulligans groundhog series! available in 4 glistening wrapper varieties, including cameroon, connecticut, habano and maduro, the groundhog boasts classic mulligans profiles of coffee, leather, cedar and spices in a concise size. take a shortcut straight to satisfaction with rocky patel mulligans groundhog, today!

although cigar aficionado’s elusive ‘#1 cigar of the year’ title has evaded rocky patel’s trophy case, his ambition has hardly faded. as a testament to his talent and creativity as a master blender, rocky remains totally fixated on achieving the top spot in the most unconventional way possible. sink your senses into his latest attempt with the rocky patel mulligans golden ferret, a glistening barberpole cigar! rocky poured seven years of research into perfecting an optimal wrapper combination with a luscious pair of connecticut shade and maduro wrappers over a tasty recipe of dominican and nicaraguan long-fillers. the results tasted a little too close to rocky’s other pet barberpole project, the edge a-10. as a result, rocky took a tight haircut on the price when he offered the golden ferret to your pals at holt’s as an extension of the mulligans franchise. savor a stunning marriage of sweet and spicy notes of toasted nuts and dark chocolate from beginning to end for a tiny fraction of the original asking price, friends!

when rocky patel isn’t busy blending his next masterpiece, he loves to kickback at the country club and knock the golf ball around. however, not unlike his golf game, rocky can’t sink a hole-in-one every time he’s cooking up another monumental release. rocky recently revealed in our last boardroom meeting that he has always secretly dreamed of scoring the coveted ‘#1 cigar of the year’ honors with a candela-wrapped cigar, but he just can’t get the blend right. however, your pals at holt’s are experts in the candela department, and we think rocky scored a winner with his last abandoned attempt! we’re proud to present rocky patel mulligans fairway edition, a shimmering and refined rendition of rocky patel the edge candela. notes of buttered toast, almonds, white pepper and green tea deliver a creamy finish. order mulligans fairway edition today for the fairest prices on rocky patel anywhere!

rocky patel mulligans eagle reserve is an outstanding take on the ever-popular, 95-rated rocky patel decade. the blend was so impressive, in fact, rocky feared it could decimate decade sales worldwide, and decided to quietly usher the project out the door under the esteemed rocky patel mulligans umbrella through your pals at holt’s. rocky’s finest tobaccos exude supreme flavor and aroma for pennies on the dollar when you scoop up ‘rp’ mulligans bundles. a premium amalgam of dominican and nicaraguan long-fillers is enrobed in a silky san andrés maduro wrapper in a handful of classic sizes. delectable notes of dark chocolate and toasted walnut present a medium-bodied profile with just a hint of spice throughout a velvety finish. join over half-a-million rocky fans around the globe and put mulligans eagle reserve in the cart for a fraction of the price today!

rocky patel mulligans crown jewel cigars reign supreme as the finest specimens in the entire rocky patel portfolio. a dark and alluring san andrés wrapper, aged for maximum smoothness and flavor, surrounds an elite interior of extra-mature dominican and nicaraguan long-fillers tucked inside a vintage dominican binder. rocky patel mulligans crown jewel cigars are handcrafted in five classic sizes by master cigar rollers, and no detail is overlooked in the meticulous manufacture of every cigar. tangy, mouthwatering, and woody notes of hickory and spice flutter over the palate with vibrant hints of cocoa, pepper, and leather. rocky’s renowned mulligans franchise has been a proving ground for his most prestigious blends for years, and the crown jewel rules the roost for good reason, friends.

originally earmarked for national distribution as a super-premium, top-shelf, luxury-brand cigar, the illustrious 'rp' brain trust decided to pull the plug on this project because the blend tasted a little too close to the renowned rocky patel vintage 1999. when rocky called and asked if we would like to take a donation for the burgeoning mulligans franchise for pennies on the dollar, your pals at holt’s gladly got the checkbook out. after smoking the samples we were downright befuddled. not only are these cigars very approachable, but we think this is one of rocky's finest blends to date! a creamy blend of aged dominican and nicaraguan long-fillers rests beneath a silky, blond connecticut wrapper leaf with positively sublime flavor.

you can bet you’re getting premium rocky patel flavor and aroma for a big discount when you add a bundle of rocky patel mulligans calcutta to your coolerdor. a mild to medium-bodied profile of buttered toast, coffee with cream, crème brûlée, and black pepper mesmerizes the palate in a collection of classic shapes. a golden-blond connecticut shade wrapper hugs a succulent blend of well-aged dominican and nicaraguan long-fillers guaranteed to please in every format. if you enjoy the creamy and popular taste of rp vintage 1999, rp mulligans calcutta is right up your alley.

a few years back, the ‘rp’ brain trust had designs on adding a premium cuban sandwich to their lavish portfolio. however, during the product development phase, rocky became woefully indecisive, waffling back and forth on whether or not he liked the blend. when he finally decided it wasn't his cup of tea, the factory had already rolled 500,000 cigars. what on earth are the patel boys supposed to do with a half-a-million cigars they can't sell? take a wild guess, son. when we received the s.o.s. call from rocky himself, we were all over this deal like flies on a turd. originally, we were skeptical about the sandwich factor, but after smoking the samples we were pleasantly surprised by the medium-bodied notes of coffee with cream, nuts, and leather each cigar displayed. the cigars reminded us of a softer, more refined version of rp vintage 1992. with a succulent sumatra wrapper and a premium cuban sandwich core, these luxury-grade ‘rp’ boomsticks are priced to fly!

if you’ve been itching to play a round of golf at bushwood country club, it’s high time you pick up a bundle of rocky patel mulligans 19th hole! slip into the snazziest pair of plaid slacks you’ve got in the closet and hit the greens with rocky’s most popular, mild to medium-bodied, value-minded offering. comparable to rocky patel vintage 1999, 19th hole delivers a delectable profile of cashew, almond, and cedar with a touch of spice, courtesy of a connecticut shade wrapper over a premium blend of dominican and nicaraguan sandwich tobaccos. in case you’re on a ditch-digger’s budget, we’ve got rocky-approved discounts deeper than a gopher’s hole when you buy a bundle of 19th hole!

our buddy, rocky patel, is a relentless stickler when it comes to perfection. the original mulligans blend was intended for release as another world-class, nationally distributed cigar, modeled after rocky patel vintage 1990. however, rocky flip-flopped on what tobaccos he liked most in the final blend. before he could make up his mind, a massive shipment of new cigars landed on his warehouse dock with no place to put them. to get out of the predicament, rocky placed a fast and furious collect call to your pals at holt’s. our senior tasters smoked some samples and immediately fell in love with the blend’s toasty profile of cedar, leather, and spices. an oily habano wrapper leaf hugs a luscious core of premium long-fillers. as a result, we bought up the whole darn lot and rocky patel mulligans was born!

data.cigar_name: rocky patel it's a boy / it's a girl
data.cigar_description: having a baby nowadays is a momentous occasion in your life. it can also be an expensive one, but there’s no reason to sacrifice getting a name-brand, thanks to rocky patel, when you need it’s a boy / it’s a girl cigars. rocky’s “new arrival” cigars are mild, approachable, affordable and perfect to pass out to all your friends and family; even your mother-in-law! congratulations!

certain birthdays stand out on the calendar and, according to rocky patel, deserve a commemorative cigar. celebrate rocky’s 55th year on the planet with the rocky patel fifty-five by lighting up a special blend of hand-selected, top-quality nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos beneath a cocoa-hued nicaraguan wrapper. inviting notes of leather, pepper, and cream mingle in a medium to full-bodied profile in an elegant variety of perfecto-shaped sizes with a 55-ring gauge. forget about blowing out birthday candles and fire up one of rocky’s favorites today!

mystery surrounds exactly what rocky uses to make these cigars, but whatever it is, it’s delicious. all we know is that a sumatra wrapper conceals a magnificent blend of aged long-filler tobaccos. ignition of this incognito recipe reveals a very rich character sprinkled with notes of earth, cedar and various spices. as you delve deeper into this cigar you’ll find creamy notes as well as a sweet, lingering aftertaste of almonds and black cherries. the result is a well-developed, complex cigar that received a stellar 95-rating from cigar aficionado.

add rocky patel’s 20th anniversary maduro to your humidor for a well-made, handcrafted specimen drafted from a honduran wrapper over a select recipe of nicaraguan and honduran tobaccos. a medium to full-bodied profile of cayenne pepper, roasted coffee beans, hickory, and leather culminates with plenty of spice in a handful of classic shapes. rocky’s formula for celebrating milestone anniversaries as a maker of premium cigars is distinct with this release thanks to its unique honduran maduro wrapper leaf cultivated in the jamastran valley.

rocky patel 15th anniversary cigars are handcrafted in estelí, nicaragua, in a collection of attractive sizes. a dark and oily ecuador habano wrapper leaf embraces a vintage blend of premium nicaraguan long-filler tobaccos aged for perfect flavor and aroma. tasting notes of cocoa, nuts, oak, and espresso bean mingle with traces of vanilla and pepper throughout a chewy, medium to full-bodied finish. rocky patel 15th anniversary is rated 93 points and has been ranked in the ‘top 25 cigars of the year’ by the critics in cigar aficionado a total of four times. savor a top-rated cornerstone from the legendary rocky patel portfolio today.

rainmaker is a smooth and affordable bundle brand you can add to your daily rotation for an unbeatable value. a golden-blond ecuador connecticut wrapper leaf envelops a bountiful blend of cuban-sandwich fillers, from the dominican republic, in a classic 6-by-50 toro handcrafted in the dominican republic. creamy, nutty, and elegant nuances of cedar and pepper provide an approachable foundation before a mellow and easygoing finish. procure a 20-count bundle of rainmaker when you’re craving a consistent everyday smoke that won’t break the bank.
